text: I find being single to be it's like
moments of like crushing loneliness
mixed with moments of true adventure and
I like to think of being single the same
way I think about my alcoholic autistic
cousin like most of the time like oh
it's so sad and then every once in a
while I'm like that is how many nickels
are in that jar you're kind of
amazing a little bit of
magic and I an amazing thing about
living in New York City as a single man
is that anyone in New York City can have
sex any night of the week if you follow
two Simple Rules one stay at the bar
until 4 in the morning and two
dramatically lower your
standards like I have seen women take
walrus's home okay and I'm not talking
about men who look like walruses I'm
talking about actual walruses on Rascal
scooters that they've driven out of the
ocean and into a bar at 3:59 a.m. and
some hipster girls just like I love a
man with a beard and they hop on his lap
and they drive back into the ocean
together it's magical
